title: [AnimeRG] Prison School - 12 (720p) Kangoku Gakuen MP4 [KoTuWa]
description:

12. Good Morning, Prison!

http://i.imgur.com/m0ik04I.png

Container          : MP4 
Video              : AVC x264.    ref 9, bframes 16. CRF 20. 1280x720. 
Audio              : FuDL. Japanese. (AAC LC). 
Subtitles          : English, HardSubs. 
 
Color Levels Corrected (As FuNi mess up by swapping TV/PC colours). 
 

Screenshots (Lossy JPG)  
http://i.imgur.com/ooGXkfE.jpg  
http://i.imgur.com/bwa0A78.jpg 

 
Regarding sources, RAWs have color accuracy but have artifacts, while FuNi has less artifacts but has color issues... 
Idea is to correct colour levels of funi.... 
Here a comparison, between Leopard-Raws and the Rework for ep 01... 
  
http://screenshotcomparison.com/comparison/134806 
 
In this release, colors are closer to raws, while having much less artifacts compared to raws, especially when there is high motion :] 
 

And about color accuracy, comparison between BakedFish reencode and the rework of ep 01 and ep 02... 
 
http://screenshotcomparison.com/comparison/134815  
http://diff.pics/GXtZMqr2rys0 
 
Some people like FuNi colors.... But they swap PC-TV colors, making the details of the dark and light areas (both ends) disappear... 
(Look at clouds, windows, face etc...). Other than lost details, it can cause eye strain! 
 
 
In PC, use a reputed media player. 
Media Player Classic - Home Cinema and MPC-BE are recommended!.. VLC is okay, but MPC variants are preferred :] 
 

Synopsis: 
On the outskirts of Tokyo stands Hachimitsu Private Academy, a storied all-girls boarding school for elite young women full of potential and good breeding. But as the new school year rolls around, one tradition is going out the window: For the first time in the school's long history, boys are being allowed to enroll. But on the first day of school, only five boys make the cut. Kiyoshi Fujino, one of the lucky few, is thrilled by this discovery, his heart leaping with joy at the thought of being surrounded by all those girls, day in and day out. But little does he know of the shocking fate that awaits him...
